queries.query: select date, logname, type from $this order by date desc
select strftime('%H:%M:%S.%f',date), logname, type from $this order by date desc

query.name: Дата сообщения, имя лога, тип; группировка по дате, логу, типу

queries.query: select date, logname, type from $this group by date, logname, type order by date desc

query.name: Время сообщения, имя лога, тип; группировка по дате, логу, типу

queries.query: select strftime('%H:%M:%S.%f',date), logname, type from $this group by date, logname, type order by date desc

query.name: Группировка по идущим подряд именам логa

queries.query: select strftime('%H:%M:%S.%f',min(date)) as ftime, strftime('%H:%M:%S.%f',max(date)) as totime, logname, error(type) from (select date, logname, type, group_logname(logname) as logname_group from $this group by date, logname, type order by date DESC) group by logname_group order by logname_group desc
select logname, count(log) as c from $this group by logname order by c desc
select strftime('%H:%M:%S.%f',date), logname, type from $this where type = 'ERROR' order by date desc
